DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select IC.InstallmentContractCode as [Contract Code], UsrLogin.UserName as [Account Username], UsrEmail.UserName as [Account Username (email)], A.DisplayName as [Account Name], IC.CreateFiscalDate as [Issue Date], dbo.fnLookupItemDesc(216,IC.InstallmentContractStatus) as [Contract Status Label], IC.TotalAmount - IC.FinancedAmount as [Down Payment], IC.FinancedAmount as [Financed Amount], IC.SettledAmount as [Total Settled Amount], IC.FinancedAmount - IC.SettledAmount as [Remaining Due Amount] from tbInstallmentContract IC left join tbAccount A on A.AccountId=IC.AccountId left join tbLoginAlias UsrLogin on UsrLogin.AccountId=A.AccountId and UsrLogin.LoginAliasType=0 left join tbLoginAlias UsrEmail on UsrEmail.AccountId=A.AccountId and UsrEmail.LoginAliasType=1 where IC.CreateFiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and IC.CreateFiscalDate<=:@DateTo

RichDescItem.Description:
Installment Contract Status Report

Abstract

“Installment Contract Status” generates a report of the installment contract status in a selected period.

Generating the report

Parameter Input
While generating the report, input parameters menu presents an intuitive interface.
Built-in wizards will help you quickly and easily create at your choice profile for your site by
  • [From date – To Date] – Period to be analysed referred to the Installment Creation Date, select the dates from the calendar.
    • Note: The dates if not specified are to be considered “Fiscal Date”

Output File Extension
Built-in wizards will help you easily and quickly generate at your choice reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Format selection is required before running the report.

  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters:

  • [Execution date/time] - Report Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [From date – To Date] – Selected Period referred to the Installment Creation Dates
Contents (by Colums)
The program produces easy-to-read reports that include text information.
  • [Contract Code] – Contract Code
  • [Account Username] – Account Login Username.
  • [Account Username (email)] - Account Login Mail address
  • [Account Name] – Account Name. Display format: “Last Name, First Name”
  • [Issue Date] - Contract Issuing Date
  • [Contract Status Label] - Contract Status (see LOOKUP TABLES >> Installment Contract Status)
  • [Down Payment] – Deposit, in local currency
  • [Financed Amount] - Total Financed Amount, in local currency
  • [Total Settled Amount] - Total settled amount, in local currency
  • [Remaining Due Amount] – Total amount still to pay, in local currency
